verses.verse: And it came <S%H1961><s%> to pass after <S%H310><s%> these <S%H428><s%> things, <S%H1697><s%> that the butler <S%H4945><s%> of the king <S%H4428><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> and his baker <S%H644><s%> had offended <S%H2398><s%> their lord <S%H113><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>

And Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> was wroth <S%H7107><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> of his officers, <S%H5631><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> the chief <S%H8269><s%> of the butlers, <S%H4945><s%> and against <S%H5921><s%> the chief <S%H8269><s%> of the bakers. <S%H644><s%>

And he put <S%H5414><s%> them in ward <S%H4929><s%> in the house <S%H1004><s%> of the captain <S%H8269><s%> of the guard, <S%H2876><s%> into <S%H413><s%> the prison, <S%H1004><s%> <S%H5470><s%> the place <S%H4725><s%> where <S%H834><s%> Joseph <S%H3130><s%> was bound. <S%H631><s%>

And the captain <S%H8269><s%> of the guard <S%H2876><s%> charged <S%H6485><s%> Joseph <S%H3130><s%> with them, and he served <S%H8334><s%> them: and they continued <S%H1961><s%> a season <S%H3117><s%> in ward. <S%H4929><s%>

And they dreamed <S%H2492><s%> a dream <S%H2472><s%> both <S%H8147><s%> of them, each man <S%H376><s%> his dream <S%H2472><s%> in one <S%H259><s%> night, <S%H3915><s%> each man <S%H376><s%> according to the interpretation <S%H6623><s%> of his dream, <S%H2472><s%> the butler <S%H4945><s%> and the baker <S%H644><s%> of the king <S%H4428><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> which <S%H834><s%> were bound <S%H631><s%> in the prison. <S%H1004><s%>
And Joseph <S%H3130><s%> came <S%H935><s%> in to them in the morning, <S%H1242><s%> and looked <S%H7200><s%> on them, and, behold, <S%H2009><s%> they were sad. <S%H2196><s%>

And he asked <S%H7592><s%> Pharaoh's <S%H6547><s%> officers <S%H5631><s%> that were with him in the ward <S%H4929><s%> of his lord's <S%H113><s%> house, <S%H1004><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Why <S%H4069><s%> look <S%H6440><s%> you so sadly <S%H7451><s%> to day? <S%H3117><s%>

And they said <S%H559><s%> to him, We have dreamed <S%H2492><s%> a dream, <S%H2472><s%> and there is no <S%H369><s%> interpreter <S%H6622><s%> of it. And Joseph <S%H3130><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to them, Do not interpretations <S%H6623><s%> belong to God? <S%H430><s%> tell <S%H5608><s%> me them, I pray <S%H4994><s%> you.

And the chief <S%H8269><s%> butler <S%H4945><s%> told <S%H5608><s%> his dream <S%H2472><s%> to Joseph, <S%H3130><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> to him, In my dream, <S%H2472><s%> behold, <S%H2009><s%> a vine <S%H1612><s%> was before <S%H6440><s%> me;

And in the vine <S%H1612><s%> were three <S%H7969><s%> branches: <S%H8299><s%> and it was as though it budded, <S%H6524><s%> and her blossoms <S%H5322><s%> shot <S%H5927><s%> forth; and the clusters <S%H811><s%> thereof brought <S%H1310><s%> forth <S%H1310><s%> ripe <S%H1310><s%> grapes: <S%H6025><s%>

And Pharaoh's <S%H6547><s%> cup <S%H3563><s%> was in my hand: <S%H3027><s%> and I took <S%H3947><s%> the grapes, <S%H6025><s%> and pressed <S%H7818><s%> them into <S%H413><s%> Pharaoh's <S%H6547><s%> cup, <S%H3563><s%> and I gave <S%H5414><s%> the cup <S%H3563><s%> into <S%H5921><s%> Pharaoh's <S%H6547><s%> hand. <S%H3709><s%>

And Joseph <S%H3130><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to him, This <S%H2088><s%> is the interpretation <S%H6623><s%> of it: The three <S%H7969><s%> branches <S%H8299><s%> are three <S%H7969><s%> days: <S%H3117><s%>

Yet <S%H5750><s%> within three <S%H7969><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> shall Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> lift <S%H5375><s%> up your head, <S%H7218><s%> and restore <S%H7725><s%> you to your place: <S%H3653><s%> and you shall deliver <S%H5414><s%> Pharaoh's <S%H6547><s%> cup <S%H3563><s%> into his hand, <S%H3027><s%> after the former <S%H7223><s%> manner <S%H4941><s%> when <S%H834><s%> you were <S%H1961><s%> his butler. <S%H4945><s%>

But think <S%H2142><s%> on me when <S%H834><s%> it shall be well <S%H3190><s%> with you, and show <S%H6213><s%> kindness, <S%H2617><s%> I pray <S%H4994><s%> you, to me, and make mention <S%H2142><s%> of me to Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> and bring <S%H3318><s%> me out of this <S%H2088><s%> house: <S%H1004><s%>

For indeed I was stolen <S%H1589><s%> away out of the land <S%H776><s%> of the Hebrews: <S%H5680><s%> and here <S%H6311><s%> also <S%H1571><s%> have I done <S%H6213><s%> nothing <S%H3808><s%> <S%H3972><s%> that they should put <S%H7760><s%> me into the dungeon. <S%H953><s%>

When the chief <S%H8269><s%> baker <S%H644><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> that the interpretation <S%H6623><s%> was good, <S%H2896><s%> he said <S%H559><s%> to Joseph, <S%H3130><s%> I also <S%H637><s%> was in my dream, <S%H2472><s%> and, behold, <S%H2009><s%> I had three <S%H7969><s%> white <S%H2751><s%> baskets <S%H5536><s%> on <S%H5921><s%> my head: <S%H7218><s%>

And in the uppermost <S%H5945><s%> basket <S%H5536><s%> there was of all <S%H3605><s%> manner of bakemeats <S%H3978><s%> for Pharaoh; <S%H6547><s%> and the birds <S%H5775><s%> did eat <S%H398><s%> them out of the basket <S%H5536><s%> on my head. <S%H7218><s%>

And Joseph <S%H3130><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> This <S%H2088><s%> is the interpretation <S%H6623><s%> thereof: The three <S%H7969><s%> baskets <S%H5536><s%> are three <S%H7969><s%> days: <S%H3117><s%>

Yet <S%H5750><s%> within three <S%H7969><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> shall Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> lift <S%H5375><s%> up your head <S%H7218><s%> from off <S%H5921><s%> you, and shall hang <S%H8518><s%> you on <S%H5921><s%> a tree; <S%H6086><s%> and the birds <S%H5775><s%> shall eat <S%H398><s%> your flesh <S%H1320><s%> from off <S%H5921><s%> you.

And it came <S%H1961><s%> to pass the third <S%H7992><s%> day, <S%H3117><s%> which was Pharaoh's <S%H6547><s%> birthday, <S%H3117><s%> <S%H3205><s%> that he made <S%H6213><s%> a feast <S%H4960><s%> to all <S%H3605><s%> his servants: <S%H5650><s%> and he lifted <S%H5375><s%> up the head <S%H7218><s%> of the chief <S%H8269><s%> butler <S%H4945><s%> and of the chief <S%H8269><s%> baker <S%H644><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> his servants. <S%H5650><s%>

And he restored <S%H7725><s%> the chief <S%H8269><s%> butler <S%H4945><s%> to his butlership <S%H4945><s%> again; <S%H7725><s%> and he gave <S%H5414><s%> the cup <S%H3563><s%> into <S%H5921><s%> Pharaoh's <S%H6547><s%> hand: <S%H3709><s%>
But he hanged <S%H8518><s%> the chief <S%H8269><s%> baker: <S%H644><s%> as Joseph <S%H3130><s%> had interpreted <S%H6622><s%> to them.
Yet did not the chief <S%H8269><s%> butler <S%H4945><s%> remember <S%H2142><s%> Joseph, <S%H3130><s%> but forgot <S%H7911><s%> him.
